Articles.Content: Hi all! I Downloaded KSP last night, and my girlfriend is already complaining that I spend too much time with 'that build-a-rocket game.' So far it\'s mostly been a build something ridiculously absurd looking that immediately explodes game, but I\'ll commence with the serious space flight soon.

Ello! Welcome to the forums!

Happy Launching!

hahahhaah

Hi all! I Downloaded KSP last night, and my girlfriend is already complaining that I spend too much time with 'that build-a-rocket game.' So far it\'s mostly been a build something ridiculously absurd looking that immediately explodes game, but I\'ll commence with the serious space flight soon.

Welcome!

I\'m working videos, maybe you can get some ideas? http://www.youtube.com/user/thedestroyingpulsar

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
dont aim it towards your face...please thats what happened to one eyed dave

I remember Dave!

He\'s stopped playing though. Something about his other eye, if I heard correctly.
shame, potato cannon blew up, piece of the tank smashed his face real bad. he can speak, but only short sentences. Get well soon!
